    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Potujemo, premikamo se - pobarvanka</string>
            <string language="en">Traveling - coloring book</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reisen - Farbtonbuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déplacement - livre de coloration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viajar - livro da coloração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggiare - libro di coloring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι - χρωματίζοντας βιβλίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El viajar - libro del colorante</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Preprosta zgodba o potovanju z različnimi prevoznimi sredstvi opremljena s sličicami, ki jih lahko pobarvamo.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple story about a trip with different means of transport equipped with images that can be colored.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potovanje</string>
            <string language="en">trip</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prevozna sredstva</string>
            <string language="en">means of transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">avto</string>
            <string language="en">car</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">letalo</string>
            <string language="en">airplane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pobarvanka</string>
            <string language="en">coloring book</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Geschichte über eine Reise mit dem 
unterschiedlichen Transportmittel ausgerüstet mit Bildern, die 
gefärbt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire simple au sujet d'un voyage avec le 
moyen de transport différent équipé des images qui peuvent être 
colorées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História simples sobre um desengate com os meios
diferentes do transporte equipados com as imagens que podem ser 
coloridas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia semplice circa un viaggio con il mezzi di 
trasporto differente dotato delle immagini che possono essere 
colorate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή ιστορία για ένα ταξίδι με τα διαφορετικά μέσα 
συγκοινωνίας που εξοπλίζονται με τις εικόνες που μπορούν να 
χρωματιστούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia simple sobre un viaje con diverso medio 
de transporte equipado de las imágenes que pueden ser coloreadas.</string>
          </description>
